actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the tip tax credit to employers of cosmetologists and to promote tax compliance in the cosmetology sector.
short_title: Cosmetology Tax Fairness and Compliance Act of 2000

summary.text: Cosmetology Tax Fairness and Compliance Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the credit for the portion of employer social security taxes paid with respect to employee cash tips to include tips given for cosmetology services. Requires information reporting by providers of cosmetology services.

titles.title: Cosmetology Tax Fairness and Compliance Act of 2000
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the tip tax credit to employers of cosmetologists and to promote tax compliance in the cosmetology sector.
